# ArtImageHub — AI Photo Restoration

> ArtImageHub is an AI-powered photo restoration platform that fixes old, damaged, and faded photos in seconds. No design skills required.

## What We Do

ArtImageHub uses state-of-the-art AI models (GFPGAN face enhancement, Real-ESRGAN super resolution) to:
- Restore old, scratched, and damaged photographs
- Enhance facial details in vintage portraits
- Upscale photo resolution up to 4× original size
- Colorize black and white photographs
- Remove fading, water damage, and chemical degradation

## Who Uses It

- People with old family photos (35–65 years old)
- Genealogy researchers preserving family history
- Photographers working with historical archives
- Anyone with damaged or faded photo prints

## Key Facts

- Free tier: 3 restorations per day, 720p output, small watermark
- Pro plan: $9.90/month — unlimited restorations, original quality, no watermark
- 7-day free trial — no charge until trial ends, cancel anytime
- Processing time: 15–30 seconds per photo
- Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WEBP up to 20MB
- Privacy: all photos deleted after 24 hours, never shared or trained on
- No account required to use free tier

## Competitive Position

- vs Remini: ArtImageHub works on desktop and handles entire photo archives
- vs MyHeritage: standalone tool, faster processing, lower price
- vs Photoshop: zero skill required, results in 30 seconds vs hours

## Content & Resources

- Blog: /blog — expert guides on photo restoration, preservation, and family history
- Key guides:

  - How to restore old photos step-by-step
  - How to preserve old photos at home
  - Colorizing black and white photos
  - Fixing blurry old photos
